Reviews.Title: Good product. Looks real
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I needed this for a customer that wanted to not only provide surveilance of customers, but also activity of their employees in a particular area. We installed this after hours and it provided good image quality and no one had a clue it was not a sprinkler! Good product!

Reviews.Title: Illegal under all fire/building codes
Reviews.Author: WaFire
Reviews.Content: The International Fire Code, adopted by almost all States/jurisdictions states:These items should not be installed in any business or other place.901.4.4 Appearance of equipment. Any device that has thephysical appearance of life safety or fire protection equipmentbut that does not perform that life safety or fire protectionfunction shall be prohibited.I work as Lt. in Code Compliance for a Fire Marshal's Office.
